Benefits from AI voice helpers
for missed calls

We’re Not Here to Replace Your Staff

Your AI Voice Assistant is simply a smart backup for moments when your team can’t pick up the phone.

Use it when:

Clients call outside
working hours

So you never miss a potential booking or question.

Your receptionist doesn't answer after 3–4 rings

The AI smoothly takes over, keeping the customer engaged.

You receive multiple calls at once

While your human host handles one, the AI can handle the rest.

You decide when the AI should transfer calls

Forward urgent or sensitive calls to your team, based on rules you set.

It can speak your clients’ language

Multilingual support makes it easy for non-native English speakers to get help.

See Our AI Voice Assistant in Action

Watch how your business can answer every call—fast, friendly,
and error-free, 24/7.

Our AI assistant handles incoming calls, answers questions, books
appointments, takes orders, and instantly sends you all the details.

Here's what you get:

This isn't just a bot — it's your virtual team member

NeverMissedCall is a fully trained AI Assistant that knows your restaurant inside and out. It handles incoming calls, answers questions, and books tables — all on autopilot.

24/7 Availability
24/7 Availability
Never miss a guest. Your assistant is always on, ready to answer, assist, and reserve.

Tailored Training for Your Business
We train your AI on your menu, FAQs, hours, locations, and real-world customer scripts — so it speaks your language.

Custom Tone & Voice

Call Recordings & Transcriptions
Call Recordings & Transcriptions

Real-Time Notifications

Frequently asked questions

Yes! Our AI Voice Agents work well across a wide range of industries. They handle repetitive calls, answer customer questions, and pass important info to your team at every stage of the customer interaction.
Industries we support include: restaurants, home services, law firms, medical practices, spas, fitness studios, and many more.

We recommend starting with a 14-day free trial to see how well the AI Voice Agent matches your communication style.
Then begin with the Essential Plan. Once you see value from capturing missed calls, you can upgrade to Pro or Premium — and we’ll gladly help with that transition.

Unlike other companies, we offer top-tier AI language models at a more affordable price.
You don’t need to train or configure anything yourself — we handle all the setup and training, so you can focus on running your business without hiring extra staff or watching long tutorial videos.

Our AI answers based strictly on the information you provide: your website, menu, price list, FAQs, etc.
The more detailed the materials we receive, the smarter and more accurate the assistant becomes.
Plus, we conduct monthly reviews of real conversations to retrain and improve the assistant continuously.

No problem. We’re a growing company committed to offering the best service at an affordable price. If your customer management system isn’t on our current integration list, we’ll work closely with you to create a solution that fits your workflow and order-taking process — no extra effort on your side.

Not sure if we are right for you?
